text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Annie Karni
“Trump has suffered a double whammy w/seniors from the coronavirus crisis, both in terms of a dislike for his personal demeanor and disapproval of his policy priorities. If there’s a durable change w/older voters, it could well cost Trump the election.”
